duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain inventory and labor management systems for Chipotle.
Conduct data validation and execute test scripts for enhancement testing regarding the systems.
Support daily functionality of the food and scheduling management system.
Respond to daily support tickets opened by field operations to troubleshoot data discrepancies or system functionality issues.
Work with system vendors to implement enhanced system functionality.
Support DC transitions and/or new DCs onboarding in food management system in partnership with Supply Chain.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree (BA/BS) from 4-year college or university preferred, but not required.
